price: Et il fut dit : "Ô terre ! Absorbe ton eau ! Et toi, ciel, cesse [de pleuvoir] ! " L’eau baissa, l’ordre fut exécuté, et l’arche s’installa sur le [Mont] Jûdi , et il fut dit: "Que disparaissent les gens pervers !"
arabic: وَقِيلَ يَٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla yāarḍu ib'laʿī māaki wayāsamāu aqliʿī waghīḍa al-māu waquḍiya al-amru wa-is'tawat ʿalā al-jūdiyi waqīla buʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
